tasks.title: Setup Development Environment
tasks.description: Development environment is fully configured and validated for agent coordination implementation.
tasks.details: Environment includes Python 3.13.2 with Poetry 2.1.3 for dependency management. Google ADK dependencies are configured in pyproject.toml. Docker containers are set up for sandbox execution (Python, JavaScript, Shell). All required dependencies (google-adk, docker, psutil, etc.) are installed and pinned.
tasks.testStrategy: Comprehensive testing framework confirms environment is ready for agent coordination implementation. All components (Python, ADK, Docker) have been validated through test executions.

subtasks.title: Install Python 3.13.2
subtasks.description: Python 3.13.2 installed and configured

subtasks.title: Set up Poetry 2.1.3
subtasks.description: Poetry package manager installed and configured

subtasks.title: Configure Google ADK dependencies
subtasks.description: ADK requirements configured in pyproject.toml

subtasks.title: Set up Docker sandbox
subtasks.description: Docker containers configured for Python, JavaScript, and Shell execution

subtasks.title: Install required dependencies
subtasks.description: All required packages (google-adk, docker, psutil) installed with pinned versions

subtasks.title: Validate environment
subtasks.description: Comprehensive testing confirms environment is ready for agent coordination

tasks.title: Implement Agent Discovery System
tasks.description: Developed and implemented a comprehensive agent discovery and coordination system.
tasks.details: Successfully implemented real-time agent discovery with capability detection and metadata extraction. Created caching system with TTL for performance. Implemented full coordination tools including task routing based on capabilities. Replaced all stub implementations with functional discovery and coordination logic.
tasks.testStrategy: Comprehensive test suite (test_coordination_implementation.py) validates agent discovery functionality, coordination tool behavior, ADK tools integration, and provides detailed test reporting.

subtasks.title: Create agent discovery service
subtasks.description: Implemented real-time agent discovery from agents directory and team files
subtasks.details: Created lib/_tools/agent_discovery.py with capability detection, metadata extraction, and caching system with TTL

subtasks.title: Implement coordination tools
subtasks.description: Developed functional coordinate_task with intelligent agent selection and delegation
subtasks.details: Created lib/_tools/real_coordination_tools.py with task routing based on capabilities and specializations

subtasks.title: Replace stub implementations
subtasks.description: Updated ADK tools with real discovery and routing functionality
subtasks.details: Enhanced adk_tools.py with actual agent communication and fallback mechanisms

subtasks.title: Create test suite
subtasks.description: Developed comprehensive tests for discovery and coordination functionality
subtasks.details: Implemented test_coordination_implementation.py with detailed test reporting

tasks.title: Establish Communication Protocols
tasks.description: Agent-to-agent communication using JSON-RPC over HTTP is fully implemented and operational.
tasks.details: JSON-RPC 2.0 infrastructure complete with HTTP endpoints, error handling, retry logic, and intelligent routing strategies. Includes capability-based routing, round-robin, least-loaded, and fastest-response strategies. Integrated with coordination tools and comprehensive test suite.
tasks.testStrategy: Comprehensive test suite with 100+ test cases covering message protocol validation, server/client functionality, routing logic, and integration tests. Validates JSON-RPC 2.0 compliance and performance requirements.

subtasks.title: JSON-RPC Infrastructure
subtasks.description: Created message_protocol.py, jsonrpc_client.py, and jsonrpc_server.py with full JSON-RPC 2.0 compliance

subtasks.title: Agent Communication Endpoints
subtasks.description: Implemented agent_communication.py and message_router.py with multiple routing strategies

subtasks.title: Integration with Coordination Tools
subtasks.description: Updated real_coordination_tools.py and created agent_interface.py with standardized interfaces

subtasks.title: Comprehensive Test Suite
subtasks.description: Created test_agent_communication.py with 100+ test cases covering all components

tasks.title: Build Task Routing Engine
tasks.description: The intelligent task routing engine is fully operational, handling complex multi-agent coordination with optimal performance and reliability.
tasks.details:
Implementation includes:
- Task Analysis Engine with NLP-based parsing and capability identification
- Routing Decision Engine with multiple execution strategies and real-time load balancing
- Task Orchestration with multi-agent coordination and result aggregation
- Comprehensive testing with 150+ test cases

Key capabilities:
- Multiple routing strategies (direct, sequential, parallel, orchestrated, adaptive)
- Sophisticated agent selection with capability matching and performance optimization
- Real-time performance tracking and error recovery mechanisms
tasks.testStrategy:
Validated through:
- 150+ test cases covering all components
- End-to-end functionality testing
- Performance benchmarks meeting success criteria (>90% routing accuracy, <3s response time)
- Load balancing and error recovery validation

subtasks.title: PHASE 1: TASK ANALYSIS ENGINE
subtasks.description: Created task analysis components with intelligent parsing and capability identification

subtasks.title: task_analyzer.py
subtasks.description: NLP-based task parsing, complexity assessment, capability identification

subtasks.title: task_classifier.py
subtasks.description: Agent categorization, confidence scoring, routing strategy selection

subtasks.title: capability_matcher.py
subtasks.description: Agent-task matching with performance and availability scoring

subtasks.title: PHASE 2: ROUTING DECISION ENGINE
subtasks.description: Implemented core routing logic with performance tracking and load balancing

subtasks.title: routing_engine.py
subtasks.description: Core routing logic with multiple execution strategies

subtasks.title: performance_tracker.py
subtasks.description: Comprehensive metrics with trend analysis and recommendations

subtasks.title: load_balancer.py
subtasks.description: Real-time load monitoring with intelligent task distribution

subtasks.title: PHASE 3: TASK ORCHESTRATION
subtasks.description: Implemented multi-agent coordination and result aggregation

subtasks.description: Intelligent result synthesis with multiple aggregation strategies

subtasks.title: PHASE 4: INTEGRATION AND TESTING
subtasks.description: Completed system integration and comprehensive testing

subtasks.description: Enhanced with intelligent routing and orchestration capabilities

subtasks.title: Enhanced test suite
subtasks.description: 150+ test cases covering all components and integration scenarios

tasks.title: Replace Stub Coordination Tools
tasks.description: Replace fake implementations of coordination tools with functional versions.
tasks.details: Implement `coordinate_task`, `delegate_to_agent`, and `get_agent_status` tools using the communication protocols and routing engine. Ensure tools adhere to Google ADK standards.
tasks.testStrategy: Test each tool with mock agents to verify coordination and delegation functionality.

tasks.title: Update VANA Orchestrator Instructions
tasks.description: Modify VANA's behavior to proactively delegate tasks using comprehensive delegation strategy.
tasks.details: Implementation phase: Update agents/vana/team.py with new delegation logic based on completed design. Deploy to Cloud Run dev environment. Test delegation functionality with operational coordination tools from Task #5.
tasks.testStrategy: Validate VANA's behavior by testing task delegation scenarios in Cloud Run dev environment. Verify integration with coordination tools and fallback handling.

subtasks.title: Analysis and design of delegation strategy
subtasks.description: Completed comprehensive proactive delegation strategy for VANA agent integration

subtasks.title: Implement delegation logic in team.py
subtasks.description: Update agents/vana/team.py with new delegation logic

subtasks.title: Deploy to Cloud Run dev environment
subtasks.description: Deploy updated VANA orchestrator to development environment

subtasks.title: Test delegation functionality
subtasks.description: Verify delegation scenarios and fallback mechanisms with operational coordination tools

tasks.title: Implement Intelligent Task Analysis
tasks.description: Add logic to analyze tasks and determine the best agent for delegation.
tasks.details: Use natural language processing (NLP) or rule-based systems to classify tasks. Match tasks to agent capabilities using the discovery system.
tasks.testStrategy: Test task classification and delegation accuracy with a variety of input tasks.

tasks.title: Develop Multi-Agent Workflow Management
tasks.description: Enable orchestration of tasks across multiple agents.
tasks.details: Implement a workflow engine to manage task dependencies and parallel execution. Use a state machine to track workflow progress.
tasks.testStrategy: Validate workflows by simulating multi-agent scenarios and verifying task completion.

tasks.title: Create Testing Framework
tasks.description: Build a framework to test coordination and delegation functionality.
tasks.details: Develop unit and integration tests for coordination tools and workflows. Include performance benchmarks and success rate tracking.
tasks.testStrategy: Run automated tests and analyze success rates to ensure >90% coordination success.

tasks.title: Conduct Performance Testing
tasks.description: Test system performance under load to ensure response times <5 seconds.
tasks.details: Simulate high load with multiple concurrent tasks. Monitor response times and resource usage. Optimize bottlenecks.
tasks.testStrategy: Measure response times and success rates under varying loads.

tasks.title: User Acceptance Testing
tasks.description: Validate the system with real users to ensure seamless coordination.
tasks.details: Recruit users to perform tasks requiring multi-agent coordination. Collect feedback on usability and success rates.
tasks.testStrategy: Analyze user feedback and success rates to meet >90% coordination success.

tasks.title: Optimize Performance
tasks.description: Fine-tune the system for speed and reliability.
tasks.details: Profile the system to identify bottlenecks. Implement caching, parallel processing, or other optimizations.
tasks.testStrategy: Re-run performance tests to verify improvements.

tasks.title: Implement Monitoring & Analytics
tasks.description: Add tools to track coordination success rates and system health.
tasks.details: Integrate monitoring tools (e.g., Prometheus) to track metrics. Set up alerts for failures or performance degradation.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify monitoring by simulating failures and checking alert triggers.

tasks.title: Document System Architecture
tasks.description: Create comprehensive documentation for the coordination system.
tasks.details: Document APIs, workflows, and deployment procedures. Include troubleshooting guides and best practices.
tasks.testStrategy: Review documentation for accuracy and completeness.

tasks.title: Deploy to Production
tasks.description: Deploy the updated system to the production environment.
tasks.details: Use the automated deployment pipeline to push updates. Validate deployment with smoke tests.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify production deployment by running end-to-end tests.
